description: A square temple near Sandwich on rising ground. The chronology is uncertain but Lewis (1966) suggests that it may begin in the early 3rd CE and ends in the later 4th CE.
bibliography: Martyn, Blick, Brindle, et al, (2015), Castle Field, Worth (Kent), available at: https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449

Klein, W., (1928), Roman Temple at Worth, Kent, Antiquaries Journal, 8, pg. 76 ff
